short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Store Citizen is a browser extension that helps see what ships are currently for sale in Star Citizen.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Never want to head to RSI to see what new ships are on sale? Fret no more, all you have to do is click a little icon on your browser to see!
